## Setting up a new visitor

1)	register on [VRS](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdbZ45OTupNymHe-iR_x6fSynQU6qrHlB3c6GClOtcmjDQVJg/viewform) (unless UoE student in which case should register via Euclid)  

    - remember to ask for access to VPN, MyEd and Learn (required for induction training)  
    - if forget to do these then can ask for access to these services via IS-helpline afterwards  

2)	complete visitors Risk Assessment (VRA); alternative would be a project SSW but have always done VRA in the past  


3)	direct student to [CVS induction page](https://www.ed.ac.uk/cardiovascular-science/staff-students-only/information-for-new-staff-students) and get them to follow the step-by-step instructions: 

    - will do some online training 
    - will fill in a LOOH form 
    - will then arrange for F2F induction 

4)	add to e-mail lists (as per instructions in CVS welcome pack on the CVS induction page)
